p.k: Elliott Gould and Cybill Shepherd star in this remake of Hitchcock's thriller as two people who are thrown into a world of political intrigue on a train in pre-war Germany
Comedy recreating classic anarchic slapstick from the 1940s and 50s. Three brothers try to save the orphanage that raised them. Do not try to copy these
Fantasy adventure starring Nicola Peltz, Jackson Rathbone and Noah Ringer. In a world that's descending into turmoil, only finding a lost Avatar can bring about harmony. Violence
Animated comedy. Scrat the sabre-toothed squirrel accidentally reactivates a buried spaceship with catastrophic results. Voices include Ray Romano, Denis
Oscar-winning drama with Nigel Hawthorne. In 1788, King George III starts exhibiting signs of mental illness and is forced to endure barbaric 'cures'
Violent sci-fi thriller with Chris Evans. After a global disaster, survivors take refuge on a train that develops its own class system. But the oppressed will rebel. Strong language
Violent western with Hailee Steinfeld, Brit Marling, Muna Otaru and Sam Worthington. Two Union soldiers target three young Southern women
Award-winning documentary about one man's back-breaking struggle to support his family by making and selling charcoal in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
